{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Vektor |image = Portrait Vektor Convo.png |image2 = PoE2 Vektor.png |caption = |race = Dwarf |subrace = Mountain |gender = Male |culture = [The Vailian Republics](/theVailianRepublics/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = Fighter |level = 3 |MIG = 16 |CON = 13 |DEX = 14 |PER = 13 |INT = 13 |RES = 11 |health = 76 |damage = 12-17 {{slash}} |accuracy = 41 |penetration = 7 |deflection = 32 |fortitude = 44 |reflex = 40 |will = 29 |dr = 3 |ability = [Hale and Hardy](/haleAndHardyDeadfire/), [Fast Runner](/fastRunnerDeadfire/), [One-Handed Style](/oneHandedStyleDeadfire/), [Two-Handed Style](/twoHandedStyleDeadfire/), [Weapon and Shield Style](/weaponAndShieldStyleDeadfire/), [Constant Recovery](/constantRecoveryDeadfire/), [Knock Down](/knockDownDeadfire/) |location = [Tikawara](/tikawara/) |quests = [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = x2 [Rice Wine](/riceWine/) |body = Príncipi Clothing |weapon1 = Hatchet (Deadfire){{!}}Hatchet |internalname = NPC_Tikawara_Vektor
CRW_Vektor |guid = d8a69a38-ea37-49d4-9527-25f275e704ea }} '''Vektor''' is a character, merchant, and a recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|The dwarf fans himself with a dishrag. His face is dark and shiny with exertion. Sweat colors wide crescents on his shirt. He looks at you like a drowning man would look at dry land.}} Vektor is a mountain dwarf from the Republics, descended from [Pargrunen](/pargrunen/) immigrants. At the present, he's a member of the Vailian Trading Company sent as part of a larger contingent to [Tikawara](/tikawara/), in order to exploit the [luminous adra](/luminousAdra/) deposits at [Poko Kohara ruins](/pokoKoharaRuins/). His team received a ducal welcome at first, until Anaharu, the local chieftain, voiced his objections and turned the local opinion against the Vailians. Although no violence happened, they were forced to sleep on their boat - except for Vektor. It seems that the local cuisine doesn't agree with him, leading to nasty runs. He suspects that the local chieftain gave his team a false lead under the priest's influence, leading them to a horrible fate. As the galley cook, he has few options at his disposal and was left stranded on the dock, waiting for relief to come. It did not come, causing him no small amount of anxiety. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = A broad variety of supplies, including fine and rare armor pieces, scrolls, the whole nine yards. |rest = |quests_started = [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = Has unique interactions with [Maia](/maia/) and [Tekehu](/tekehu/). |crew = {{crewrank|1|Cook}}
Personality: Chatty, Loyal }} ## =Wares = Notable wares include: * [Acina's Tricorn](/acinasTricorn/) * [Gauntlets of Reliability](/gauntletsOfReliability/) * [Grimoire of Disruption](/grimoireOfDisruption/) * [Swordsman's Bracers](/swordsmansBracers/) * [Stormturner Cloak](/stormturnerCloak/) ## =Quests = * [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/): Talking to him starts the quest. ## Gallery Portrait Vektor Convo.png | Vektor's conversation portrait. Portrait Vektor sm.png | Vektor's crew member portrait. His face is dark and shiny with exertion. Sweat colors wide crescents on his shirt. He looks at you like a drowning man would look at dry land.}} Vektor is a mountain dwarf from the Republics, descended from [[Pargrunen]] immigrants. At the present, he's a member of the Vailian Trading Company sent as part of a larger contingent to [[Tikawara]], in order to exploit the [[luminous adra]] deposits at [[Poko Kohara ruins]]. His team received a ducal welcome at first, until Anaharu, the local chieftain, voiced his objections and turned the local opinion against the Vailians. Although no violence happened, they were forced to sleep on their boat - except for Vektor. It seems that the local cuisine doesn't agree with him, leading to nasty runs. He suspects that the local chieftain gave his team a false lead under the priest's influence, leading them to a horrible fate. As the galley cook, he has few options at his disposal and was left stranded on the dock, waiting for relief to come. It did not come, causing him no small amount of anxiety. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = A broad variety of supplies, including fine and rare armor pieces, scrolls, the whole nine yards. |rest = |quests_started = [[The Storms of Poko Kohara]] |quests_involved = |none = |other = Has unique interactions with [[Maia]] and [[Tekehu]]. |crew = {{crewrank|1|Cook}}
Personality: Chatty, Loyal }} ===Wares=== Notable wares include: * [[Acina's Tricorn]] * [[Gauntlets of Reliability]] * [[Grimoire of Disruption]] * [[Swordsman's Bracers]] * [[Stormturner Cloak]] ===Quests=== * [[The Storms of Poko Kohara]]: Talking to him starts the quest. ==Gallery== Portrait Vektor Convo.png | Vektor's conversation portrait. title: Vektor
